title: Pulchritude: Volume One
description: Lt. Blake Morgan is rather ordinary by all appearances. Though, appearances can be deceiving. His normal life is soon obliterated by unexpected twist and turns when he has a spellbinding encounter with a mythical creature. Blake is faced with many earth shattering revelations, though the one that affects him the most, is his undeniable love for the creature Cora. She will soon help him unravel a millennium old puzzle, in which he finds himself being the key to the beginning and the end. He will have to choose between his species, his new found soul mate, or himself...
author: J.K. Ervin
